item.description:
Taoist meditation is a method for cultivating, refining, and circulating internal energy within the chakras and meridian channels in the body. Taoists believe that breathing and energy meditation fills the reservoirs of the chakras and meridian with energy, which is then distributed to all the major organ systems.

Join us for a one hour meditation with light stretching followed by a roasted corn or barley tea. Afterward, discussion will explore the connection between the breath, energywork and healing. We'll focus on the question: As energy healers, what can we do to increase our energy to heal others and ourselves.

Please wear comfy clothing. No previous experience necessary. This event is free and all physical fitness levels are welcome. Practice can be adapted to suit individual needs.
item.name: Taoist Meditation, Tea & Talk on Energy Healing
